quest.name: Second Guest
journal:
 Quest Sync
Eurydome has a use for your unique charms.
objectives: Speak with the Bureau of the Architect envoy.
Deliver the collection of crystallized concepts to Eurydome.

dialogue.name: EURYDOME
dialogue.text: Oh my, aren't you adorable! Hmm... Actually, there's something you might be able to help me with.

dialogue.name: EURYDOME
dialogue.text: A visitor from the Bureau of the Architect has arrived at Propylaion to deliver new concepts. I would like you to offer her the warmest of welcomes!

dialogue.name: EURYDOME
dialogue.text: Normally, we'd have our own familiars attend to such duties, but most of them are already entertaining other guests. There's been rather a lot lately, you see.

dialogue.name: EURYDOME
dialogue.text: On the other hand, this would be the perfect opportunity to show her an entirely new and─What's a nice way to put this?─idiosyncratic familiar. That being you, of course. I'm sure she'd be delighted to meet you!

dialogue.name: EURYDOME
dialogue.text: Oh, you'd like some sort of description would you? Well, I believe she has a white mask and long, black robes. Does that narrow it down?

dialogue.name: BUREAUSTAFF04284
dialogue.text: What a pleasant surprise! You must be one of the most staggeringly genericcuriously elongatedeminently portableexcessively energeticastonishingly brawnybafflingly pricklyluxuriously coiffuredanatomically inexplicable familiars I've ever seen!

dialogue.name: BUREAUSTAFF04284
dialogue.text: Eurydome chose her representative well, it would appear. As a matter of fact, I too have an errand to ask of you, namely the delivery of these concepts.

dialogue.name: BUREAUSTAFF04284
dialogue.text: I have brought them all the way from the Akadaemia Anyder. Three aquatic fauna specimens from the Words of Mitron and one flora sample from the Words of Halmarut. All very fascinating, as my counterparts here will soon discover.

dialogue.name: BUREAUSTAFF04284
dialogue.text: It would also be prudent to remind Eurydome not to let their captivating nature distract her from making her observations. Well then, there's no time like the present!

dialogue.name: EURYDOME
dialogue.text: I trust our guest was as enamored with you as I am?

dialogue.name: EURYDOME
dialogue.text: New concepts for us? And fascinating to the point of being distracting? What an odd thing to warn me about, though it does all sound rather intriguing.

dialogue.name: EURYDOME
dialogue.text: The Akadaemia Anyder always produces concepts of the most outstanding quality, and I'm eager to learn what treats we have in store on this occasion. Let me see...

dialogue.name: EURYDOME
dialogue.text: Hmm... From the Word of Mitron we have what seems to be an aquatic mollusk capable of storing aether in its shell. I can only guess as to what purpose that would serve, but I daresay all will become abundantly clear in due course.

dialogue.name: EURYDOME
dialogue.text: Oh, I do apologize! I already find myself mesmerized by these concepts, just as our visitor predicted. For your part in bringing me these wonders, you have my thanks.
